words.clue: Usado para bater nos tambores e pratos
Pratos usados juntos, para marcar o tempo
Single stroke, double stroke, paradiddles são nomes de...
Técnica de tocar 2x de forma repetida com a mesma mão
Um toque leve e um toque acentuado juntos, um "chute" antes da batida principal.
Um toque duplo rápido (drag) seguido por um toque acentuado, como um "rufo".
Ênfase dada a uma nota específica.
Tocar a pele e a borda da caixa simultaneamente (som potente).

l10n.probematicWords: Some words could not be placed. If you are using fixed words, please make sure that their position doesn't prevent other words from being placed. Words with the same alignment may not be placed touching each other. Problematic word(s): @words

a11y.crosswordGrid: Crossword grid. Use arrow keys to navigate and the keyboard to enter characters. Alternatively, use Tab to navigate to type the answers in Fill in the Blanks style fields instead of the grid.
a11y.check: Check the characters. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11y.showSolution: Show the solution. The crossword will be filled with its correct solution.
a11y.retry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
